00027 #include "OgreBillboard.h"
00028 
00029 #include "OgreBillboardSet.h"
00030 
00031 namespace Ogre {
00032 
00033     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00034     Billboard::Billboard():
00035         mOwnDimensions(false),
00036         mDirection(Vector3::ZERO),
00037         mPosition(Vector3::ZERO),
00038         mParentSet(0),
00039         mColour(ColourValue::White)
00040     {
00041     }
00042     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00043     Billboard::~Billboard()
00044     {
00045     }
00046     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047     Billboard::Billboard(const Vector3& position, BillboardSet* owner, const ColourValue& colour)
00048     {
00049         mPosition = position;
00050         mOwnDimensions = false;
00051         mParentSet = owner;
00052         mColour = colour;
00053     }
00054     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00055     void Billboard::setPosition(const Vector3& position)
00056     {
00057         mPosition = position;
00058     }
00059     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00060     void Billboard::setPosition(Real x, Real y, Real z)
00061     {
00062         mPosition.x = x;
00063         mPosition.y = y;
00064         mPosition.z = z;
00065     }
00066     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00067     const Vector3& Billboard::getPosition(void) const
00068     {
00069         return mPosition;
00070     }
00071     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00072     void Billboard::setDimensions(Real width, Real height)
00073     {
00074         mOwnDimensions = true;
00075         mWidth = width;
00076         mHeight = height;
00077         mParentSet->_notifyBillboardResized();
00078     }
00079     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00080     bool Billboard::hasOwnDimensions(void) const
00081     {
00082         return mOwnDimensions;
00083     }
00084     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00085     void Billboard::_notifyOwner(BillboardSet* owner)
00086     {
00087         mParentSet = owner;
00088     }
00089     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00090     void Billboard::setColour(const ColourValue& colour)
00091     {
00092         mColour = colour;
00093     }
00094     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00095     const ColourValue& Billboard::getColour(void) const
00096     {
00097         return mColour;
00098     }
